page.title: 19TRADE:BED'HM:HED'HM
page.content: In addition to the 2 pubs & Woodton village shop - which houses the Post Office & offers virtually everything barring butcher's meat - a surprising number of small concerns are run from people's homes.This is a recent growth & in Bedingham includes an electrician a roofing contractor,a health-food wholesaler,a hairdresser & a precision engineering business;whereas Hedenham can boast a silk-printing operator.The more usual country services include the family-run milk round,a beekeeper who also grows vegetables for sale,a smallholder who is into specialist Agri-feedstuffs & buildings & who also offers a sewage disposal service - the majority of us has septic tanks.Heden- ham has a man who breeds & trains gun- dogs & runs kennels; but farming,the production & selling of crops,stock & milk,is the major business of the area
